message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll love it, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment. I'm willing to let it go for $1200000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1100000. I think this is a fair price considering the value you'll get from the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $950000. I believe that's a fair price for the product and my budget.

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm counteroffering at $1050000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I think it's a great deal for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $975000. I believe that's a fair price for the product and my budget, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on this price.

I understand you're willing to walk away, Bob, but I'm not willing to give up on the deal just yet. I'm willing to make one final concession. I'm counteroffering at $1025000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I think it's a great opportunity for you to get the product at a fair price.
